ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] The view from the sky (Plane of)...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Either.  I believe the African is slightly larger, which would you could handle by increasing T and r appropriately.  :) ... This probably started because
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 13 Mar 2000, Talies the Wanderer wrote:
> >From: <kim@...>
> >
> >For steady state flight, D (drag) = T (thrust), so:
> >
> >Vo = sqrt(T/Cd*pi*r^2*rho)
>
> Was that for an African or European?

Either. I believe the African is slightly larger, which would
you could handle by increasing T and r appropriately. :)

> *gawd* I'm gonna HAVE to save this one ;)

This probably started because when Rokenn asked that his monk
be admitted into my guild and Ezhar (mutual friend) suggested
some sort of trial of entry, I wrote:

To enter into the Platinum Sphere, first you must answer me
these questions three:

What is your name?

What is your quest?

What is are the best three songs for a bard to play given an
all level-38 group with a warrior (1500 hp, avg damage 20
pts/rnd), ranger (1300 hp, avg damage 18 pts/rnd), paladin
(1400 hp, avg damage 15 pts/rnd), cleric (1800 mana, only
healing), druid (1500 mana, only nuking with starfire),
fighting a level-38 melee mob (3500 hp, avg damage 40 pts/hit
with an average of 2 attacks per round at a 70% hit rate)?

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
